title: Cigar Smoking Games & Sports With George Rico of Gran Habano
itunes:title: Cigar Smoking Games & Sports With George Rico of Gran Habano
description:
LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage… Spring is in the Air… it’s the 1st show of the spring season and it’s time to go outside here in New England and light up cigars.In the first hour we welcome George Rico of Gran Habano to the show. He was scheduled to be here in the studio but due to travel restrictions he joins us live via remote in Miami, Florida as we smoke the Gran Habano #5 Imperial.

In the second hour with sports being canceled we dig deep and discuss outdoor games and sports that go great with cigar smoking. We do this as we light up the La Aurora Barrel Aged by Karl Malone.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
